# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Line at (-15.0, -50.0)
A mining and smelting setup for processing iron ore consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15.0, -50.0) facing down, mining iron ore
- Burner inserter at (-14.5, -48.5) transferring items from drill to furnace 
- Stone furnace at (-14.0, -47.0) for smelting iron ore into plates

The structure is fueled with coal and set up to automatically mine iron ore and smelt it into iron plates.

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied spaces
- Check if the target position is already occupied by another entity before placing
- When placing entities next to each other, ensure proper spacing to avoid overlap
- Consider the entity dimensions (tile width/height) when calculating placement positions

### Errors when inserting items
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting to insert into entities
- Keep track of fuel (coal) usage and ensure sufficient quantities for multiple entities

### Errors with entity dimensions and calculations  
- Cannot directly add entity WIDTH/HEIGHT properties - need to get the actual numeric values first
- Use proper spacing calculations that account for entity dimensions when placing related entities

### Errors with crafting requirements
- Some items like iron plates can only be crafted in furnaces, not directly
- Ensure all ingredient requirements are met before attempting to craft items
- Check if required sub-ingredients need to be manufactured first
